text: The 2014 CAMS WA AUS F1000 Championship was a CAMS sanctioned Australian state motor racing title for drivers of Formula 1000 racing cars. It was the first state series for Formula 1000s to be held in Australia. The championship was contested over five round series which began on 26 April at Barbagallo Raceway and ended on 21 September at the same track.Race Calendar, www.ausf1000.com.au Retrieved on 03 November 2014 It was won by Stewart Burns, driving a Speads JKS 01. ==Teams and drivers== The following teams and drivers contested the 2014 CAMS WA AUS F1000 Championship. Each car was powered by a 1000cc motorcycle engine, as mandated by the category regulations. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !Team !Chassis !No !Driver |- |rowspan=1| 2nd wind Sailboards | Firman 1000 | 2 | Jez Hammond |- |rowspan=1| Ribuck Industries | Speads JKS 01 | 3 | Stewart Burns |- |rowspan=2| Fleetcare | Stohr | 4 | Leanne Tander |- | Stohr | 4 | Daniel Gate |- |rowspan=2| Tony Rova | Speads RM 08 F1000 | 5 | Daniel Gate |- | Speads RM 08 F1000 | 5 | Tony Rova |- |rowspan=1 | AP Racing Stohr | Stohr F1000 | 8 | Adam Proctor |- |rowspan=1 | | Speads RM03 | 11 | Bruce Allen |- |rowspan=1 | Tow It Trailers | Stohr F1000 | 98 | Ben Riley |- |} ==Calendar== The championship was contested over a four round series, with three races at each round, all of which were held at Barbagallo Raceway. A fifth round to be held in June was cancelled. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Round ! Date ! Round winner ! Car |- ! 1 | 26 April | Ben Riley | Stohr F1000 |- ! 2 | 7 June | align="center" colspan=2 | Cancelled |- ! 3 | 13 July | Ben Riley | Stohr F1000 |- ! 4 | 31 August | Leanne Tander | Stohr |- ! 5 | 21 September | Daniel Gate | Stohr |- |} ==Points system== Championship points were awarded on a 25-20-18-17-16 basis to the top five classified finishers in each race.2014 Round by Round, www.competitiondriversclub.myclub.org.au Retrieved on 03 November 2014 The results for each round of the Series were determined by the number of points scored by each driver at that round. The driver gaining the highest points total over the five rounds was declared the winner of the Championship. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;" !valign="middle"| Pos !valign="middle"| Driver !colspan="3"| Round 1 !colspan="3"| Round 3 !colspan="3"| Round 4 !colspan="3"| Round 5 !valign="middle"| Pts |- !
